smells.name: StringLiteralDuplication
smells.description: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

instances.message: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

smells.name: TooGenericExceptionThrown
smells.description: Thrown exception is too generic. Prefer throwing project specific exceptions to handle error cases.

instances.message: RuntimeException is a too generic Exception. Prefer throwing specific exceptions that indicate a specific error case.

smells.name: FunctionParameterNaming
smells.description: Function parameter names should follow the naming convention set in the projects configuration.

instances.message: Function parameter names should match the pattern: [a-z][A-Za-z0-9]*
Function parameter names should match the pattern: [a-z][A-Za-z0-9]*

smells.name: ObjectPropertyNaming
smells.description: Property names inside objects should follow the naming convention set in the projects configuration.

instances.message: Private object property names should match the pattern: (_)?[A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9]*
Private object property names should match the pattern: (_)?[A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9]*

smells.name: VariableNaming
smells.description: Variable names should follow the naming convention set in the projects configuration.

instances.message: Variable names should match the pattern: [a-z][A-Za-z0-9]*

smells.name: UnsafeCallOnNullableType
smells.description: It will throw a NullPointerException at runtime if your nullable value is null.

instances.message: Calling !! on a nullable type will throw a NullPointerException at runtime in case the value is null. It should be avoided.

smells.name: UnsafeCast
smells.description: Cast operator throws an exception if the cast is not possible.

instances.message: findViewById<View>(R.id.toolbar) cannot be safely cast to Toolbar.
findViewById<View>(R.id.container) cannot be safely cast to ViewPager.
mSectionsPagerAdapter!!.getRegisteredFragment(0) cannot be safely cast to EditorFragment.
mSectionsPagerAdapter!!.getRegisteredFragment(1) cannot be safely cast to PreviewFragment.
findViewById<View>(R.id.tabs) cannot be safely cast to TabLayout.
findViewById<View>(R.id.fab) cannot be safely cast to FloatingActionButton.
mSectionsPagerAdapter!!.getRegisteredFragment(0) cannot be safely cast to EditorFragment.
mSectionsPagerAdapter!!.getRegisteredFragment(0) cannot be safely cast to EditorFragment.
mSectionsPagerAdapter!!.getRegisteredFragment(1) cannot be safely cast to PreviewFragment.
mSectionsPagerAdapter!!.getRegisteredFragment(0) cannot be safely cast to EditorFragment.
rootView.findViewById<View>(R.id.editText) cannot be safely cast to EditText.
rootView.findViewById<View>(R.id.webView) cannot be safely cast to WebView.
super.instantiateItem(container, position) cannot be safely cast to Fragment.
view.findViewById<View>(R.id.editTagName) cannot be safely cast to EditText.
activity cannot be safely cast to OnAddTagDialogFragmentInteractionListener?.

smells.name: NewLineAtEndOfFile
smells.description: Checks whether files end with a line separator.

instances.message: The file ApplicationTest.kt is not ending with a new line.
The file ExampleUnitTest.kt is not ending with a new line.

smells.name: ReturnCount
smells.description: Restrict the number of return statements in methods.

instances.message: Function getPageTitle has 3 return statements which exceeds the limit of 2.
Optional braces in when expression

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

instances.message: This expression contains a magic number. Consider defining it to a well named constant.
This expression contains a magic number. Consider defining it to a well named constant.

smells.name: UnusedImports
smells.description: Unused Imports are dead code and should be removed.

instances.message: The import 'android.webkit.WebSettings' is unused.
The import 'android.net.Uri' is unused.
Private property in is unused.

smells.name: ExpressionBodySyntax
smells.description: Functions with exact one statement, the return statement, can be rewritten with ExpressionBodySyntax.

instances.message: Functions with exact one statement, the return statement, can be rewritten with ExpressionBodySyntax.
Functions with exact one statement, the return statement, can be rewritten with ExpressionBodySyntax.
Functions with exact one statement, the return statement, can be rewritten with ExpressionBodySyntax.

smells.name: MayBeConst
smells.description: Reports vals that can be const val instead.

instances.message: TAG can be a `const val`.
SAVED can be a `const val`.
RESTORED_TO_DEFAULT_TEXT can be a `const val`.
RESTORED_TO_LAST_SAVED_FILE can be a `const val`.
TAG_PATTERN can be a `const val`.
DEFAULT_HTML_STRING can be a `const val`.
DEFAULT_FILE_NAME can be a `const val`.
TITLE can be a `const val`.

smells.name: SpacingBetweenPackageAndImports
smells.description: Violation of the package declaration style.

instances.message: There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of AddTagDialogFragment.
